function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of critical reflections on the importance of cities and how they are governed","Impact":"Inadequate understanding and response to the impact of the pandemic on cities and other threats such as climate change","Mitigation":"Encouraging critical reflections and discussions among planners and local authorities","Technologies":"Urban planning and governance technology for data analysis and decision-making","People":"Planners, local authorities","Owner":"Planners, local authorities"},{"Description":"Failure to rally support for transformative actions towards addressing threats like climate change","Impact":"Inadequate preparedness for addressing looming threats such as climate change","Mitigation":"Active engagement and support from planners, local authorities, and communities","Technologies":"Public engagement platforms, urban planning software for climate adaptation","People":"Planners, local authorities, communities","Owner":"Planners, local authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of disclosure of competing financial interests or personal relationships","Impact":"Potential bias or influence on the work reported in the paper","Mitigation":"Require transparent disclosure of financial interests and personal relationships","Technologies":"Disclosure management systems, conflict of interest software tools","People":"Authors, researchers","Owner":"Journals, research institutions"}]}
